name: Timber Jump VR
description:
Timber Jump is a VR game mimicking a true adventure experience that will make you face and conquer your height fears, and allow you to feel the experience of jumping between timbers above mountains.
This game can either be played directly on the floor or with the use of a supporting structure as illustrated in the pictures. However, care should be given when using a structure and the presence of an adult is required to avoid injury from falling (the adult should be positioned at near proximity from the player).
Timber Jump VR is equipped with a default optional setup, as well as a customized one that allows the user to adjust the dimensions based on their own preference.
